analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassa na ttikaḥ āsavasāsavaduka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsavañca iva sa āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ

original: ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca
analyzed: ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsavañca iva sa āsavañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā
analyzed: na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca iva na noāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa āsavam ca eva

original: no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo
analyzed: no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigham sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
